entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 2009/12. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population
entry.dcterms:creator: Hegedűs, Péter
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-H32: TÁRKI Omnibus 2009/12. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population. data sheet. Version: 2011-04-07
entry.dcterms:creator: Dencső, Blanka
Sik, Endre
entry.dcterms:description: The blocks of the TÁRKI 2009/12. omnibus survey: 1; Political attitude. 2; Attitude toward the cars aboriginal investigation
entry.dcterms:subject: mass political behavior, attitudes
political ideology
transport, travel (and mobility)
person
survey data
cross-section

Multi-stage proportionately stratified national probability sample representative of the adult Hungarian population. Respondents were selected using the random walking method out of each strata. Numbers of selected persons are proportional to strata's size
face-to-face interview
